document_data.caption: A map showing Tezambril's Street and surroundings in the Southern Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Tezambril's Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Tezambril's Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Tezambril's Street was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]]. The road originated in the north on [[Robin's Way]] where it branched south to eventually end in a neighborhood in front of [[Anchoret's Court]]. Tezambril's Street also connected with [[the Forcebar]], [[Tulmaster's Street]], and [[Rednose Alley]].
document_data.Notable Locations: [[New Moon Swords]] was located along the east side of Tezambril's Street near Rednose Alley.
